modules.description: This module implements email transmission using Lwt for asynchronous networking, providing two core functions: direct email delivery over SMTP on port 25 with optional STARTTLS, and authenticated submission to an SMTP relay on ports 465 or 587. It supports destination addresses as IP addresses or domain names, handles TLS configuration with optional certificate authentication, and enforces secure authentication policies based on server capabilities. It is used to send emails programmatically in OCaml applications requiring direct MTA interaction or authenticated relay through services like Gmail's SMTP.
